channel.title: WhatsMac
channel.description: A native Mac app wrapper for WhatsApp Web

item.title: Version 1.2.0
item.description:
NOTE: This update cannot be applied automatically and must be downloaded manually by clicking "Learn More"

Changes

  • WhatsMac is now named ChitChat
  • Fix for no-images bug caused by recent WhatsApp Web changes
  • Various graphical fixes
  • Additional keyboard shortcuts (see README)
  • The app is now signed with a developer certificate so is allowed by GateKeeper

item.title: Version 1.3.0
item.description:
NOTE: If you are still running a version of ChitChat released as WhatsMac then this update cannot be applied automatically and must be downloaded manually from release page.

Changes

  • Fix for "Safari Version" bug introduced Aug 2015
  • Usability Fixes
  • Various graphical fixes
  • Now supports iOS devices without jailbreak!

item.title: Version 1.4.0
item.description:
NOTE: If you are still running a version of ChitChat released as WhatsMac (1.0) then this update cannot be applied automatically and must be downloaded manually from release page.

Changes

  • Added 10.11 compatibility
  • Improved scrolling performance
  • Improved ChitChat's handling of notifications
  • Added status bar icon

Credits

  • @congbach
  • @tschoffelen
  • @andersio (who contributed almost all of this release!)

item.title: Version 1.4.1
item.description:
NOTE: If you are still running a version of ChitChat released as WhatsMac (1.0) then this update cannot be applied automatically and must be downloaded manually from release page.

Changes

  • The status bar notification icon is now removable by a toggle in the Menu Bar

Credits for this release go entirely to @andersio!

item.title: Version 1.5.0
item.description:
NOTE: If you are running 10.11 El Capitan, then this update cannot be applied automatically and must be downloaded manually from the release page.

Changes

  • Fixed bug which prevented traffic light buttons from being shown after exiting full screen mode
  • Fixed issue which prevented WhatsApp Web from loading in some cases on 10.11
  • Improved the status bar icon's appearance in dark mode
  • You can now double click on the window's title bar to maximise/shrink it
  • The status bar notification icon is now removable by a toggle in the menu bar (added in 1.4.1)

Once again, this update was contributed entirely by @andersio - thanks yet again!
